statements: SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01' AND hire_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position, salary FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 AND position = 'CEO' AND hire_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, salary FROM employees WHERE department IN ('IT', 'Finance') ORDER BY department, salary;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2020-01-01' AND hire_date <= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceEval WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE salary >= 50000;
SELECT employee_name, department, performance_score FROM Employees JOIN PerformanceEval ON Employees.employee_id = PerformanceEval.employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date, salary FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY department, employee_name;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.employee_name, p.performance_score, p.evaluation_date FROM Employees e JOIN PerformanceEval p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.performance_score > 80 ORDER BY p.evaluation_date DESC;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.employee_name, e.department, COUNT(p.evaluation_id) AS evaluation_count FROM Employees e LEFT JOIN PerformanceEval p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_id, e.employee_name, e.department HAVING evaluation_count > 0 ORDER BY evaluation_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, department, salary FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, salary FROM Employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department, salary FROM Employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY department DESC;

SELECT employee_name, department, performance_rating FROM Employees JOIN PerformanceEvaluations ON Employees.employee_id = PerformanceEvaluations.employee_id WHERE evaluation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;

SELECT Employees.employee_name, Schedules.day_of_week, Schedules.shift_start_time, Schedules.shift_end_time FROM Employees JOIN Schedules ON Employees.employee_id = Schedules.employee_id WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' OR day_of_week = 'Friday' ORDER BY Employees.employee_name ASC;

SELECT employee_name, employee_role, department, performance_rating FROM Employees JOIN PerformanceEvaluations ON Employees.employee_id = PerformanceEvaluations.employee_id WHERE performance_rating < 3 ORDER BY employee_role DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales'
SELECT * FROM payroll WHERE pay_amount > 5000
SELECT employee_id, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM performance_evaluations ORDER BY performance_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'Accounting' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, pay_amount, pay_date FROM payroll WHERE pay_amount > 5000 ORDER BY pay_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, performance_rating FROM performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating >= 4 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT name, position, department FROM employees
SELECT id, name, employment_date FROM employees
SELECT * FROM payroll
SELECT id, salary FROM payroll
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT e.name, p.salary FROM employees e JOIN payroll p ON e.id = p.emp_id WHERE p.salary > 50000;
SELECT d.name, e.name, e.position FROM departments d JOIN employees e ON d.head_id = e.id ORDER BY d.name ASC;
SELECT e.name, pe.evaluation_score, pe.comments FROM employees e JOIN performance_evaluations pe ON e.id = pe.emp_id WHERE pe.evaluation_score < 3 ORDER BY e.name DESC;
SELECT s.date, e.name, s.shift_start, s.shift_end FROM schedules s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_id = e.id WHERE s.date = '2022-12-15';
